rows: Enter the chart name to display on the widget. The field is required.
Select the color of the chart.
Select the style of the chart widget.
Enter the labels of X and Y axes on the chart. These fields are only displayed for charts with axes ("Spline," "Line," "Bar," "Area," "Column," and "Scatter").
